title: Can you sell tier 2 runes?
body:
You used to be able to transform them into tier 3 runes

But because tier 2 runes are so cheap they removes that (understandable)
But how can I get rid of tier 2 runes now then?

replies.body:
Hey Arduno,

If you're looking to clean up your rune inventory, you can [**submit a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) to Riot Games Player Support requesting that they remove any runes that you'd like removed. They should be able to take of your request, no problem! :)

There's no way currently through the client to remove older runes since the combiner was removed.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll look into removing them for you manually.  See you there!

-- What Wuks said!
